akn:section.akn:heading: Weapon system component or technology prototype projects: oversight

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The Secretary of each military department shall establish an oversight board or identify a similar existing group of senior advisors for managing prototype projects for weapon system components and other technologies and subsystems, including the use of funds for such projects, within the military department concerned.
